entities.name: LINKEDIN
entities.description: LinkedIn connects professionals globally to enhance productivity and success, transforming hiring, marketing, selling, and learning. LinkedIn offers both free services and monetized solutions, including Talent Solutions, Marketing Solutions, Premium Subscriptions, Sales Solutions, and Learning Solutions. The company has over 750 million members and offices worldwide.

entities.name: DYNAMICS
entities.description: Dynamics offers cloud-based and on-premises business solutions for financial management, ERP, CRM, supply chain management, and other application development platforms for small and medium businesses, large organizations, and divisions of global enterprises. Dynamics 365 is a unified set of cloud-based intelligent business applications.

entities.name: APPLE
entities.description: Apple distributes versions of its pre-installed application software, such as email and calendar products, through its PCs, tablets, and phones.

entities.name: CISCO SYSTEMS
entities.description: Cisco Systems is using its position in enterprise communications equipment to grow its unified communications business.

entities.name: FACEBOOK
entities.description: Facebook is a global application vendor competing with Office.

entities.name: GOOGLE
entities.description: Google provides a hosted messaging and productivity suite and competes with Office.

entities.name: IBM
entities.description: IBM is a global application vendor competing with Office.

entities.name: OKTA
entities.description: Okta provides security solutions across email security, information protection, identity, and governance.

entities.name: PROOFPOINT
entities.description: Proofpoint provides security solutions across email security, information protection, identity, and governance.

entities.name: SLACK
entities.description: Slack provides teamwork and collaboration software and competes with Office.

entities.name: SYMANTEC
entities.description: Symantec provides security solutions across email security, information protection, identity, and governance.

entities.name: ZOOM
entities.description: Zoom offers videoconferencing and cloud phone solutions and competes with Office.

entities.name: ORACLE
entities.description: Oracle competes with Dynamics by providing cloud-based and on-premises business solutions.

entities.name: SALESFORCE.COM
entities.description: Salesforce.com competes with Dynamics by providing cloud-based and on-premises business solutions.

entities.name: SAP
entities.description: SAP competes with Dynamics by providing cloud-based and on-premises business solutions.

relationships.relationship_description: Both LinkedIn and Dynamics are business solution providers under the same company, offering complementary services in productivity, marketing, and enterprise resource planning.
LinkedIn faces competition from Facebook in the online professional network and recruitment space.
LinkedIn faces competition from Google in online professional networks and recruitment services.
LinkedIn faces competition from Slack in professional networking and recruitment.
LinkedIn faces competition from Zoom in professional networking and recruitment.
LinkedIn faces competition from Oracle in talent management and human resource services.
LinkedIn faces competition from Salesforce.com in talent management and human resource services.
LinkedIn faces competition from SAP in talent management and human resource services.
Dynamics competes with Oracle in providing business solutions for financial management, ERP, and CRM.
Dynamics competes with Salesforce.com in providing business solutions for financial management, ERP, and CRM.
Dynamics competes with SAP in providing business solutions for financial management, ERP, and CRM.
Both Apple and Cisco Systems compete with Office in providing software and unified communications solutions.
Both Apple and Google compete with Office in providing productivity and messaging software.
Both Apple and Zoom compete with Office in providing videoconferencing and communication solutions.
Both Cisco Systems and Google compete with Office in providing productivity and messaging software.
Both Cisco Systems and Zoom compete with Office in providing videoconferencing and communication solutions.
Both Google and Zoom compete with Office in providing videoconferencing and communication solutions.
Both Okta and Proofpoint provide security solutions across email security, information protection, identity, and governance.
Both Okta and Symantec provide security solutions across email security, information protection, identity, and governance.
Both Proofpoint and Symantec provide security solutions across email security, information protection, identity, and governance.
